skills.name: HUMAN COST
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target that increases based on your MAX HP.
• 45% Chance to Stun the target for 1 turn.
• 35% Chance to grant Accuracy Up to each ally for 2 turns.

skills.name: BUGLE SOUND
desc: • Heal all allies based on your MAX HP.
• Revive a random dead ally with Full HP.
• 35% Chance to grant Revenge to self for 2 turns.
• 100% Chance for Revenge if you have Accuracy Up.
• 35% Chance to grant Counterstrike to allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: LEADING CHARGE
desc: Immune to Stun and Reduce Max HP effects. Gain Perfect Hit and 100% Critical Strike status for 1 turn if Regen is active at the start of your turn.
